attributes.action: Allow only English MPs to vote on English Domestic issues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Democratic process is being undermined when representatives of constituencies not affected are able to determine the result of a vote at Westminster. Scots MPs have already done this on several occasions to the detriment of the English. Yet, in Scotland, Scots MPs have voted to the benefit of their own people. Not only is England being ruled by Scotland, but the English often get the raw deal!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
